name: Gateway Solution
description: The game takes place in the year of 3005, a time when humanity has expanded their reach beyond the solar system. You'll play as Amber O’Scully, an engineer on the Boundless, a space station orbiting Earth, waking up to find it in ruin, with the rest of the crew missing. Amber must work their way through the ship, piecing together what happened to the station, solving puzzles to progress.
